properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 050300Z TO 120259Z MAY
   BY M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-17.22S 040-01.47W, 22-21.63S 039-54.30W,
   22-26.68S 039-57.92W, 22-22.23S 040-05.02W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 900/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 120359Z MAY.
